markdownRemark.html:
Canonical URL: https://axrl.org/TestResult

TestResult

A test result describes if a single node "passed" or "failed" a test, or if that test was "incomplete". Alternatively, a test result can express if a test was "inapplicable"

Properties of TestResult

description:
  type: Text
  description: Description of the (part of the) requirement that was tested
summary:
  type: Text
  description: A shortened variation of the description
helpUrl:
  type: URL
  description: URL where more information about the requirement can be found
outcome:
  type: OutcomeType
  description: "Outcome of the test: passed, failed, inapplicable or incomplete"
impact:
  type: ImpactType
  description: "Impact of the test result on users: minor, moderate, serious, critical. Impact must only be set if the outcome is failed."
remediation:
  type: Remediation
  description: Description of how to resolve the issue. Remediation must not be set if the outcome is passed or inapplicable.
node:
  type: Node
  description: Definition of the node that was tested. Node must not be set if the outcome is inapplicable.

Examples

{
  "@type": "TypeName",
  "...": "..."
}
